page.title: 05Day in the life of a farmer
page.content: {07.30-09.00.}Day begins - organise work for 3 men and youth. Sort out any cattle/calving problems with stockman. Help unload trailers of hay in barn. {09.00.}Breakfast and make telephone calls to vet/suppliers and read correspondence. {09.30.}Walk around the crops looking for diseases and pests over the 500 acres of corn and beans. {12.00.}Lunch.{13.00.}Meet up with stockman to inject cow and sort out calves for disbudding. {15.00.}Mower breaks down go to get spares from Yatton Keynell. {16.30.}Cup of tea.{16.45.}Haymaking. {18.30.}Dinner.{19.30.}Office work - cattle records, crops etc. {20.30.}Finish check of cows close to calving. Can be calving cows at midnight. Mr Carter farms near Hilmarton.
